title: Lock fails for unlimited approvals
summary: This bug report discusses an issue with the `lock()` function in the `LockManagerBase` contract. The function is intended to lock a user's entire approved balance, but it fails to do so in the most common case. This is because most users give the contract an unlimited allowance, which causes the `transferFrom()` call to fail. The recommendation is to have the `_incomingTokenBalance()` function return either the actual balance or the allowance, whichever is smaller. The bug has been fixed in the code and verified by the team.
